content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items to the furnace.

### Coal Production Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting coal.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items to the furnace.

### Additional Iron Furnaces
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) for additional iron ore smelting.
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) for additional iron ore smelting.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces without sufficient inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. This will prevent errors related to insufficient inventory.

### Warnings about full chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to ensure continuous operation of mining drills and prevent interruptions in resource extraction.

### Warnings about furnaces with no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that furnaces have a continuous supply of raw materials to avoid idle time and maximize production efficiency.
